description: OpenCode Agent Task Manifest - Maps agent tasks to required workspace files

itp-generation.description: Generate Inspection and Test Plans from project specifications

project-details.description: Extract project metadata, parties, contracts, and key dates from project documents
project-details.output_type: Project node with comprehensive metadata and HTML

wbs-extraction.description: Extract Work Breakdown Structure from project scope and specifications
wbs-extraction.output_type: Hierarchical WBS nodes with work packages

lbs-extraction.description: Extract Location Breakdown Structure from project drawings and site information
lbs-extraction.output_type: Hierarchical LBS nodes with location mappings to WBS

pqp-generation.description: Generate Project Quality Plan based on project requirements and ISO 9001
pqp-generation.output_type: Management Plan with sections and content blocks

emp-generation.description: Generate Environmental Management Plan based on project requirements and ISO 14001

ohsmp-generation.description: Generate OHS Management Plan based on WHS legislation and ISO 45001

document-metadata.description: Extract document register metadata from project files
document-metadata.output_type: Document nodes with classification and metadata

standards-extraction.description: Extract all referenced standards and specifications from project documents

qse-generation.description: Generate corporate QSE system procedures and templates
qse-generation.output_type: QSE system content with procedures and forms

shared_files.description: Files included in all agent workspaces

notes.schema_usage: TypeScript schema files from schemas/neo4j/ are copied to agent workspace for reference. These define the exact output structure agents must produce.
notes.database_access: Agents read from Standards (7687) and Project Docs (7688), write to Generated (7690)
notes.workspace_structure: Each agent session gets a unique workspace at /app/opencode-workspace/agent-sessions/{session-id}/ with task-specific files copied in
